text: Hari Shankar Mishra is a current Governor of Madhesh Province. He was Appointed Governor, as per the Article 163 (2) of the Constitution of Nepal by the President Bidya Devi Bhandari on the recommendation of the Council of Ministers of the Government of Nepal on 17 August 2021. He is a former member of House of representatives. == References == Category:Living people Category:Nepalese politicians
title: Hari Shankar Mishra
